title: xClock - Circles
summary: xClock series has landed on Android Wear.

descriptionHTML:
Enjoy clean and modern watch face on your writs with xClock - Circles.

Features:
1. Simple and modern design
2. 9 color themes + ambient mode
3. Battery level for watch
4. Current date & weekday
5. 12h nad 24h time formats

Settings:
1. Main circle color
2. Background circles color
3. Time format


Works with Asus ZenWatch, LG G Watch R, LG G Watch, LG Watch Urbane, Moto 360 and Sony Smartwatch 3.


If you have any problem with watch face please contact me.
